benchmark_details.name: NIFTY Financial News Headlines Dataset
benchmark_details.overview: The NIFTY dataset is designed to facilitate and advance research in financial market forecasting using large language models (LLMs). It includes two versions tailored for different modeling approaches: NIFTY-LM, for supervised fine-tuning of LLMs; and NIFTY-RL, formatted for alignment methods to align LLMs via rejection sampling and reward modeling.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To facilitate and advance research in financial market forecasting using large language models.

data.source: Aggregated high-quality news headlines and market data from various sources.
data.annotation: Headlines ranked and filtered based on their relevance to financial topics.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on prediction accuracy of stock movement labels (Rise, Fall, Neutral).
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better performance in predicting stock movement.
methodology.validation: Data split into train (1,477), validation (317), and test (317) sets.
